sentences.en: At which point my townsfolk started calling the new Edisonians "dot heads.
sentences.cn: 此时我的同乡们开始把这些新来的爱迪生市民叫“点脑壳”。

sentences.en: Being relatively wealthy townsfolk, they can also afford decent armour.
sentences.cn: 作为富有的市镇居民他们还可以负担得起象样的盔甲.

sentences.en: But I wouldn't mind going back, because I can be with my townsfolk.
sentences.cn: 但我也不介意回去, 因为我可以与家乡人在一起.

sentences.en: By night, the furnaces glowed and the hammers clanged long after townsfolk were abed.
sentences.cn: 到晚上, 直到夜深人静以后许久,工厂里仍是炉火熊熊,铁锤丁当.

sentences.en: Empty beaches are perfect for strolling and the sociable townsfolk are masters of the art of shooting the breeze.
sentences.cn: 空旷的海滩非常适合散步，爱好社交的市民都是闲聊的大师。

sentences.en: Every week a Mystical Pond produces nice little presents for the townsfolk.
sentences.cn: 每周,这个池塘就会给镇上的居民些许礼物.

sentences.en: He sought to blame innocent townsfolk for the boy's disappearance and had them brutally executed.
sentences.cn: 他把男孩的失踪归咎于无辜镇民,并把他们野蛮的处决.

sentences.en: I never thought homely, townsfolk killing Brits could be so hot.
sentences.cn: 我也没想到普通的小市民，杀戮起来可以如此性感。

sentences.en: Overcome by grief and dementia, Leoric had many of the townsfolk executed for high treason.
sentences.cn: 被丧子之痛与痴呆癫狂压倒, 雷欧瑞克以叛国罪处死了许多村民.

sentences.en: There was constant trouble, even fighting, between the townsfolk and the students.
sentences.cn: 市民与学生之间经常发生纠纷, 甚至殴斗.

sentences.en: Townsfolk , too, were the first to feel new currents of European thought.
sentences.cn: 最先接触到欧洲新思潮的, 也是城里的人.

trans.tran_cn: 镇民，市民，市镇居民，城里人
trans.tran_en: The townsfolk of a town or city are the people who live there
